## load() function

Load the default theme Use config to supply overrides to specific definition blocks

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function load(config?: ThemeConfig): Theme;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | [ThemeConfig](./core.themeconfig.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> the theme configuration |
